# What it costs to run prim.sh

Full cost transparency. Infrastructure costs are shared overhead;
per-route provider costs live in each primitive's `prim.yaml`.

## Infrastructure

| Item | Provider | Monthly | Notes |
|------|----------|---------|-------|
| vps | digitalocean | $12.00 | s-1vcpu-2gb (2GB RAM, 1 vCPU, 50GB disk). Shared by all prims |
| domain_prim_sh | namecheap | $2.92 | prim.sh, $34.98/yr amortized. Order 195616489 (2026-02-25) |
| domain_primitiveshell_com | namecheap | $0.96 | primitiveshell.com, $11.48/yr incl. ICANN. Order 195781641 (2026-02-27) |
| domain_primitiveshell_org | namecheap | $0.61 | primitiveshell.org, $7.28/yr incl. ICANN. Order 195781641 (2026-02-27) |
| x_premium | x | $8.00 | @useprim marketing. Web pricing (switched from iOS $11/mo on 2026-02-28) |
| github | github | $0.00 | Free plan. Downgraded from Team ($4/mo) on 2026-02-28 — public repo |
| cloudflare | cloudflare | $0.00 | Free plan — R2, DNS, Pages |
| **Total fixed** | | **$24.49/mo** | |

## Risk flags

| Primitive | Endpoint | Severity | Description |
|-----------|----------|----------|-------------|
| spawn.sh | POST /v1/servers | high | $0.01 one-time charge vs $4/mo DO droplet (-39,900% margin). Needs recurring billing model. |
| search.sh | POST /v1/search | high | x402 price ($0.001) < provider cost ($0.005). -400% margin. Loss leader at beta pricing. |
| token.sh | POST /v1/tokens | moderate | 90% margin at normal Base L2 gas (~$0.10). Mainnet congestion can push gas above $1. Needs gas oracle. |
| domain.sh | POST /v1/domains/register | moderate | Dynamic pricing via Namecheap. Margin depends on TLD wholesale cost. No fixed margin guarantee. |
